name: m314ts-xunit
description: My take on xUnit in TypeScript.

scripts.tests: npm run build && node ./lib/tests/no-test-result-test.js && node ./lib/tests/testcase-base-test.js && node ./lib/tests/testcase-result-test.js && node ./lib/tests/testresult-test.js && node ./lib/tests/testsuite-test.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run tests
